div.p: Clinical Terms Version 3 contains over 200,000 coded concepts arranged in a sub-type hierarchical structure.
Top level hierarchy sections: Disorders Findings Morphology Surgical procedures Regimes & therapies Investigations Stages & scales Occupations Organisms Units Drugs Appliances & equipment

valueString.value: Clinical Terms Version 3 is updated at 6 monthly intervals.

Name: Dr David Robinson; Address: NHS Information Authority; Aqueous 2; Rocky lane; Aston cross; Birmingham; UK; Telephone: +44 (0)121 333 0314; Fax: +44 (0)121 333 0334; E-mail: david.robinson@nhsia.nhs.uk
